evidence.source_document: Order Re National Science Foundation's Suspension of Grants
evidence.text: Pursuant to the Preliminary Injunction (Dkt. No. 55), the suspension of the grants at issue here is VACATED.

extracted.value: VACATE the suspension of the grants at issue

evidence.text: NSF shall RESTORE the affected members of the Form Termination Class to the status quo

Order Granting Motion for Preliminary Injunction and Provisional Class Certification

evidence.source_document: Order Re National Science Foundation's Suspension of Grants
evidence.text: The parties shall file a joint status report by August 19, 2025, confirming all steps to comply with the Preliminary Injunction have been completed by NSF or, in the event that has not occurred, an explanation of why it was not feasible and a description of the steps that have been taken thus far.

extracted.value: Filing a joint status report by August 19, 2025, confirming all steps to comply with the Preliminary Injunction have been completed by NSF or, in the event that has not occurred, an explanation of why it was not feasible and a description of the steps that have been taken thus far

evidence.source_document: Motion for Partial Stay Pending Appeal Relief Requested by August 4, 2025
evidence.text:
Defendants and any officers, agents, servants, employees, or attorneys of Agency Defendants or
any of their subagencies. This injunction shall further apply to persons who are in active concert
or participation with Agency Defendants' officers, agents, servants, employees, and attorneys,
including but not limited to Defendant Department of Government Efficiency ("DOGE"). Fed.
R. Civ. P. 65(d)(2).
IT IS SO ORDERED.
